welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cambira, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches, lively culture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Apucarana Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Apucarana Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights within Brazil.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
